Shadai:
Greetings, traveler! I am Shadai if Hellbound, the legendary Dwarven blacksmith. Ah, I know I may look a bit shabby, but you mustn't judge a sword by its sheath! Ha ha ha! You are lucky fellow, my friend, to have bumped into me. Interesting in turning that luck into wealth? I'll make yota deal: if you get me an item I need, I'll use my skills to craft you something.
Ask about Ancient Tome of the Demon.
Process the cursed Seal Stones.
Exchange a shoulder ornament to enchance the power armor.
Enchance the power armor.
Remove power from armor.
